title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; ships macOS/Linux/Windows binaries.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and async helpers; chat, embed, pull, push, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for Node & browsers; promises & streams.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration via Ollama LLM and embeddings classes.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; folders, RAG, voice.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting, markdown.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; sync & async, Kotlin extensions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, voice bots, fine-tuning, edge deployment.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code generation and chat using Ollama.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group chat support, streaming, per-user model choice.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaTextEmbedder.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to cache and serve Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering async/tokio client for Ollama API.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: gRPC/protobuf shim exposing Ollama services for enterprise integrations.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot with slash commands, threads, attachment reading.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter adding JWT auth, rate limits, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-reddit-bot
summary: Reddit reply bot using Ollama to answer questions in chosen subreddits.
